column5: TMDIThis aint no meToo Davinci Its a game changer If you build it will come Augmented Reality

TMDI Great people make the difference between good and great companies Titan continues to add great people that further guarantee excellent results This stock will rise rapidly as people realize that great leadership great technology a massive growing robotic surgery market and a moat around entry by competitors make this an excellent stock and company to be in As per Zachs article today Last month Titan Medical announced the appointment of Charles W Federico as chairman of the board of directors Federico who was associated with MAKO Surgical and Smith Nephew SNN in the past has 46 years of experience in the medical device field Very bullish on the stock and company
